telegram_user_id.description: Telegram Account ID for Bot Apps

telegram_is_valid.description: Validation status of attached telegram account

firebase_fcm_token.description: FCM Notification Token for Mobile Apps

line_user_id.description: Line Account ID for Bot Apps

email.description: Email for Auth and Task Scheduling

created_at.description: Timestamp when the admin was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the admin was updated

message.description: Message or description of the error

stack_trace.description: Trail of function calls leading up to the error

file.description: Path of the file where the error is faced

line.description: Line of code in specific file where the error is faced

created_at.description: Timestamp when the error was faced

fixed_at.description: Timestamp when the dev team finally fix and deploy the bug / error fix

faced_by.description: ID of the user who specific faced the error

type.description: Type of the failed jobs on Task Scheduling

status.description: Status of the failed jobs on Task Scheduling

created_at.description: Timestamp when the jobs had failed
Timestamp when the user created the history

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the history

inventory_merk.description: Merk or brand of the inventory

inventory_room.description: Room where the inventory is located

inventory_rack.description: Rack or location within the storage

inventory_image.description: Firebase Storage URL to the image of the inventory

inventory_unit.description: Unit of measurement for the inventory

inventory_capacity_unit.description: Unit of capacity for the inventory

is_favorite.description: Indicates if the inventory is marked as a favorite

is_reminder.description: Indicates if a reminder is set for the inventory

created_at.description: Timestamp when the inventory was created

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the inventory

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the inventory was updated

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the inventory was deleted

tokenable_type.description: Model / Role who generated the auth token

tokenable_id.description: ID of the user who generated the auth token

name.description: Source of the auth token generated

token.description: Auth token that will be used for Auth Bearer all the protected API

created_at.description: Timestamp when the auth token was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the auth token was updated

expires_at.description: Timestamp when the auth token will expired

last_used_at.description: Timestamp when the last time token was used for calling other protected API

created_at.description: Timestamp when the reminder was created

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the reminder

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the reminder was updated

id.description: Primary key for the report item

created_at.description: Timestamp when the report item was created

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the report item

is_reminder.description: Indicates if a reminder is set for the report

remind_at.description: Timestamp when the report remind to user

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user created the report

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the user updated the report

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the user deleted the report

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the report

last_execute.description: Timestamp when the reminder was executed

telegram_is_valid.description: Validation status of attached telegram account

firebase_fcm_token.description: FCM Notification Token for Mobile Apps

line_user_id.description: Line Account ID for Bot Apps

phone.description: Phone number for Task Scheduling and OTP Auth

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the user was updated

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user make the request

created_by.description: ID of the user who make the request

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme
